name: Dino Attack (lukepass86)
description:
That incredible scoop didn't go quite as planned, now you are the wrong person in the wrong place...

Try to survive and escape the monster that is destroying the city!

  • Avoid the missiles that are aimed at the monster
  • Avoid its dangerous flames!
  • Collect the films to recover lives

Controls:

  • Press the arrow keys / WASD to move the helicopter
  • On mobile you can use the touch controls on the right
  • Press P to pause the game

Credits:

This game was created for the jam LOWREZJAM 2021.

  • Graphics and programming by Luca Passini
  • Game design by Jonathan Gervasi and Luca Passini
  • Main music theme by Matthew Pablo from OpenGameArt
  • Various sound effects from OpenGameArt
